OutPerform
the Market.

Optimized Portfolio Access.
Advanced AI. Improved
Decision-Making.

Quant Alpha – Giving investors the edge in a landscape where marginal gains create exponential growth.

Start 7-days Trail

Scroll to explore

Solution

Investers at every level
lose money in the stock
market. why?

Beginner

Investors lose money because they simply don’t understand how the stock market works

Mid-Level

Investors often lack the discipline to develop and stick to a long-term strategy

Senior

Investors don’t have enough meaningful data to conduct proper quantitative research & acquire significant statistical findings, leading to plateaus and inconsistencies in their performance

Quant Alpha offers a solution to individual investors and institutional players who are interested in adding an extra layer of reliability and sophistication to their investment strategy.

How it
works? Our goal at Quant Alpha is to share empirical results of high statistical significance and confidence intervals to help investors achieve sustainable, long-term growth.

We provide investors with cutting edge quantitative analysis that is backed by proven AI algorithms that adapt and evolve to help you make quicker, better decisions. Decisions that are impossible to reach with a qualitative-only investing model. How it
works? This technology allows users to invest in proven systems that historically outperform the market, gain access to advanced statistical models and methods, and exploit market inefficiencies to maximize your effectiveness as an investor.

Quantitative investing prevents emotional biases and poor judgment from getting in the way of your success as an investor. Remember to rebalance monthly, don't chase stocks or try to time the market, and be patiently confident in Quant Alpha's long-term strategy. How it
works? Unsurprisingly, the most disciplined investors are also the most informed ones, because they truly understand their portfolio's cyclic behavior. That's why we highly recommend reading our free ebook that we send you when you sign up for your free trial.

“Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning and Factor Investing” acts as a guide to help you avoid critical mistakes and maximize opportunities for long-term growth with the help of our platform. How it
works? Unsurprisingly, the most disciplined investors are also the most informed ones, because they truly understand their portfolio's cyclic behavior. That's why we highly recommend reading our free ebook that we send you when you sign up for your free trial.

“Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning and Factor Investing” acts as a guide to help you avoid critical mistakes and maximize opportunities for long-term growth with the help of our platform.

Effortless

Benefits of Using Quant Alpha

Downside Protection, Higher Returns -
Optimized Portfolio, Industry-defining
Principles. This is just a start.

Downside Protection

Research in behavioral finance shows that investors feel the pain of a loss more than twice as strongly as they feel the enjoyment of making a profit. This psychological stress often leads investors to make irrational decisions that can ultimately ruin their financial endeavors.

To mitigate such pain, we provide our users with an AI-powered Downside Protection Dashboard to control drawdowns during periods of heightened turmoil. The maximum historical drawdown since 1927 (including the Great Depression) is just -27.1%, compared to -89.2% for the S&P 500.

Higher Returns - Optimized Portfolio

Quant Alpha processes millions of diverse datasets across local and international markets with the help of our highly intuitive AI engine. These AI algorithms use intricate pattern recognition, generalized modeling, and unseen-data testing to predict market trends with the highest degree of accuracy.

Members get access to our easy-to-understand and best-performing portfolio, with optimized factor concentrations and rebalancing frequency to put that key data in the palm of your hand. All you have to do is execute.

Save Time

Rotate and rebalance your portfolio with our strategy - in just 5 minutes per month. That’s just 1-hour per year of execution time to outperform even the best players in the industry.

Our portfolio is updated at the beginning of each month, so you can spend less time worrying about the market and more time focusing on what you love.

Increase Discipline

With our prudent asset allocation system, long-term investment philosophy, and downside protection model, it's easy for our members to maintain a disciplined approach under any market conditions.

Industry-defining Principles

When it comes to investing, being on the cutting edge requires the sharpest minds working to push the boundaries of the industry. Quant Alpha uses advanced machine learning techniques.

These include:
- Neural Networks / Deep Learning Regression
- K-fold Cross-Validation Using “Purging” and “Embargo” methods
- Markowitz’s Portfolio with Advanced Nested Clustered Optimization
- Šidák correction - Familywise Error Rate for False Strategy Rejection

World-Class Organization

Our founder cultivated his expertise with a master’s degree in engineering from Penn State. He went on to continue his education at Harvard and Oxford Business Schools and is now having a disruptive impact on the industry with his quantitative investing systems. A mission like this would not have been possible without help from the great minds of our engineering team, who have come to Quant Alpha from companies like Tesla, Apple, Google, and Amazon.

Certain qualities separate the good from the great - and our background, expertise, and dedication to developing a world-class platform are what separate us from the pack.

Huge Capacity Long-Term Strategies

Using the most strict calculation methods, our research suggests a maximum capacity of over $165 Billion can exploit our strategies. As of today, it’s only followed by roughly $14 Billion, mostly consisting of hedge funds and institutional traders. Other methods that consider limits to arbitrage, market friction, and transaction costs suggest a much higher capacity limit, especially through the lens of behavioral finance.

This creates a unique opportunity to be an early adopter and develop a long-term investment strategy backed by already-proven results.

To learn more, get started with our free trial to receive a free copy of our popular eBook titled "Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning & Factor Investing."

Get
Started
Now

This creates a unique opportunity to be an early adopter and develop a long - term investment strategy backed by already proven results.

Start 7-days Trail

More than 883 experts use Quant Alpha

Exceed Market Averages

We’d love to help you too.

We help a worldwide client base improve their investment performance.

Get Started

Investin Being Redefined

Key Insights

Having access to the data is one thing. Being connected with established investors who can help you apply that data is another.

Everyone wants to make money on the stock market, but most people make too many errors to earn a living from investing.

Learn from successful investors who have applied the Quant Alpha platform to their investment strategy.

From reducing emotional errors to achieving true consistency, our high-performing traders contribute world-class level insights to help you navigate the possibilities of quantitative investing.

Get Started For Free
Today

Having access to this quality of investment reports used to be reserved for the wealthiest 1% of investors. Now you can leverage our quantitative analytics to not only outperform the market, but outperform investors with higher prestige and capital as well.

Instead of paying fund managers a portion of your profits, leverage Quant Alpha’s massive datasets to increase returns and mitigate drawdowns.

Remove the noise

Apply advanced analytics to execute your strategy at the perfect moment.

Access our Premium Portfolio

Leverage empirical results and high-confidence intervals to add an effective layer to your current investing strategy.

Protect against drawdowns - by using analytics to fortify your approach.

Start 7-days Trail

Cancel it easily

Still unsure?

Test our logic

If our platform doesn’t add the depth of insight that you’re looking for, then you’re free to cancel.

It’s really that simple. Because we’re so confident in our platform, we’ll happily let the portfolio do the talking.

Getting started doesn’t cost a dime. But it could certainly help you make one.

If your free trial of Quant Alpha adds valuable insight to your long term investment strategy, then great; continue using our platform. As investors, we understand the exponential growth made possible by marginal improvements.

Get Started

Our Story

Quant Alpha was founded in 2019 after successfully launching multiple quantitative investing systems that continue to influence the possibilities that exist within the field.
Quant Alpha was founded in 2019 after successfully launching multiple quantitative investing systems that continue to influence the possibilities that exist within the field.
